rows.label: tev012501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Peter about the work that the Pathfinders do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Peter if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Peter about Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Peter about Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Peter about FrontierNav's installation progress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0001
rows.name: What's this? Another fan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, I suppose it's inevitable that a man as handsome
and skilled as myself would attract this sort of attention.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Regardless, I always strive to be courteous to my fans,
so I'll answer your question about my body of work
with the Pathfinders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Our primary duty is to range throughout Mira and
install data probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0006
rows.name:
After all, without our efforts to expand FrontierNav
with these probes, BLADE would be hard pressed to
make any progress in their survey of the planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0009
rows.name:
And so, as FrontierNav expands, missions that were
not previously available become possible to pursue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0010
rows.name:
That sets the stage for completing important objectives
such as seeking out possible locations of parts of the
Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0011
rows.name:
It is a grueling and dangerous job, but for the sake
of humanity's future, pursue it I must![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0014
rows.name:
That idiot Bates has installed his data probe in the
wrong place yet again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0015
rows.name:
And so it falls upon me to go out there and correct
his mistake. How I tire of dealing with rank amateurs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0016
rows.name:
This will be quite the expedition! But I hope I might find
unexplored territories and scenic viewpoints along the
way, giving me chances to toast the majesty of nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0017
rows.name:
I pray that you also make the time to relax during
your missions. There's no need to exhaust yourself
out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0025
rows.name:
There's an enormous stone bridge known as
Big Arch in the northern part of Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Apparently there's a FrontierNav probe placement site
at the start of that arch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0027
rows.name:
But to reach it, you need to ascend from the Aaroy
Plain base camp and cross the Twin Arches.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0028
rows.name:
And that area is reported to be firmly under the
Ganglion's control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0029
rows.name:
What a grueling job that will be! If you're intending
to take it on yourself, make sure you're well-prepared
for the effort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0044
rows.name:
There's a natural bridge formation known as the
Great Trident Crossing in the northern part of Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0045
rows.name:
That leads to the dangerous Hushflood area,
which is a major indigen habitat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0046
rows.name:
And yet, there seem to be numerous FrontierNav probe
placement sites along the banks of that stream.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0047
rows.name:
Why must reaching FrontierNav probe sites always be
such a bother?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0048
rows.name:
The Poindexters who calculate their locations must
truly have it out for us Pathfinders![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0063
rows.name:
Thanks to your hard work and the exertions of us
Pathfinders, an impressive amount of data probes
have been installed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0064
rows.name:
Just as America was rapidly stripped of its mystery by
its ever-spreading colonists, so too will the uncharted
wilds of Mira be tamed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0065
rows.name:
It makes me a little sad to think of it, and not only
because we Pathfinders will soon be out of a job![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0066
rows.name:
Perhaps we should make the most of it by opening
tour companies and leading the people of New LA to
some of Mira's rarely-seen sights...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Peter about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0067
rows.name:
My deepest thanks to you. Your victory over Bates has
filled my pockets and heart alike.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0068
rows.name: Hmm? You look confused...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0069
rows.name:
Were you unaware that the members of Team Corwin
had been wagering on the outcome?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0070
rows.name:
But I'm calling it a win-win. Bates returned with his life,
and I won a substantial sum. You really have come in
quite handy, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0073
rows.name:
You must let me buy you drink a sometime.
Really, it's the least I could do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Peter about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0074
rows.name:
Even the stoic Captain Corwin seemed dispirited after
that last incident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0075
rows.name:
I joined Corwin because I thought he would lead me to
many new and spectacular Miran sights.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0076
rows.name:
I can't allow him to roll over and die so easily.
We need him to keep carrying the team![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0079
rows.name:
I am confident that our team will continue to be at
the forefront of exploring Mira's uncharted lands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0082
rows.name:
And if we are ever attacked like that again,
we'll flee as far as our feet can carry us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Peter about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0084
rows.name:
Team Corwin is no more, but I will never forget our
eminent captain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0085
rows.name:
We chased after him like children as he led us to
spectacular sights in his pursuit of a new world for
all humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0086
rows.name:
Thanks to him, we saw and experienced things that
we never could have otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012501_MSG0089
rows.name:
That's why I don't think anyone—even Bates—could
regret having been a part of his team.[ST:wait ]
